Sub-category.title: New Tires
Sub-category.description: Installation of new tires on the vehicle.
Sub-category.symptoms: Worn-out tires, punctured tires beyond repair, or upgrading tires for better performance.
Sub-category.nationalAveragePrice: $100-200 per tire (excluding the cost of tires)

Sub-category.title: Flat tire patching repair
Sub-category.description: Repair tire punctures and leaks to restore functionality.
Sub-category.symptoms: Visible tire puncture, loss of tire pressure, or flat tire.

Sub-category.title: Tire balancing
Sub-category.description: Balancing weight distribution on tires to ensure smooth and even tire wear.
Sub-category.symptoms: Vibration in the steering wheel or uneven tire wear.

Sub-category.title: Tire rotation
Sub-category.description: Moving tires to different positions on the vehicle to promote even tire wear.
Sub-category.symptoms: Uneven tire wear or manufacturer's recommended maintenance interval.

Sub-category.title: Brake rotor and pad replacement
Sub-category.description: Replacing worn-out brake pads and damaged brake rotors to ensure safe braking performance.
Sub-category.symptoms: Squealing or grinding noises when braking, reduced braking effectiveness, or uneven brake pad wear.

Sub-category.title: Engine air filter change
Sub-category.description: Replacement of the engine air filter to maintain clean air intake for engine combustion.
Sub-category.symptoms: Reduced engine performance, dirty air filter, or manufacturer's recommended maintenance interval.

Sub-category.title: Cabin air filter change
Sub-category.description: Replacement of the cabin air filter to ensure clean air inside the vehicle's cabin.
Sub-category.symptoms: Reduced air flow from vents, musty odor in cabin, or manufacturer's recommended maintenance interval.

Sub-category.title: Transmission fluid change
Sub-category.description: Replacement of old transmission fluid with fresh fluid to maintain transmission performance.
Sub-category.symptoms: Slipping gears, rough shifting, or manufacturer's recommended maintenance interval.

Sub-category.title: Rear differential fluid change
Sub-category.description: Replacement of rear differential fluid to ensure proper lubrication and performance.
Sub-category.symptoms: Whining noise from rear differential, leaking fluid, or manufacturer's recommended maintenance interval.

Sub-category.title: Brake fluid change
Sub-category.description: Replacement of old brake fluid to maintain brake system effectiveness.
Sub-category.symptoms: Soft or spongy brake pedal, contaminated brake fluid, or manufacturer's recommended maintenance interval.

Sub-category.title: Power steering fluid change
Sub-category.description: Replacement of old power steering fluid to ensure proper steering performance.
Sub-category.symptoms: Whining noise when turning steering wheel, difficulty in steering, or manufacturer's recommended maintenance interval.

Sub-category.title: Four wheel alignment
Sub-category.description: Alignment of all four wheels to ensure proper vehicle handling and tire wear.
Sub-category.symptoms: Vehicle pulling to one side, uneven tire wear, or after suspension or steering system repairs.

Sub-category.title: Thrust line alignment
Sub-category.description: Alignment of wheels along the thrust line to correct vehicle drift or steering issues.
Sub-category.symptoms: Vehicle veering to one side, steering wheel off-center, or uneven tire wear.

Sub-category.title: Oil change
Sub-category.description: Replacement of old engine oil and oil filter to ensure engine lubrication and longevity.
Sub-category.symptoms: Dirty or low engine oil, illuminated oil warning light, or manufacturer's recommended maintenance interval.

Sub-category.title: Battery replacement
Sub-category.description: Replacement of old or failing battery to ensure reliable vehicle starting.
Sub-category.symptoms: Slow cranking or failure to start, corroded battery terminals, or old battery age.

Sub-category.title: Gas cap replacement
Sub-category.description: Replacement of damaged or malfunctioning gas cap to prevent fuel evaporation and maintain emission standards.
Sub-category.symptoms: Check engine light due to evaporative emission system fault, fuel odor, or visible gas cap damage.

Sub-category.title: Preventative Maintenance Inspection (PMI)
Sub-category.description: Preventative Maintenance Inspection (PMI) is a thorough examination and evaluation of various components and systems within a vehicle to identify potential issues before they escalate into major problems. PMI is typically conducted at regular intervals as part of a proactive maintenance strategy aimed at preventing breakdowns, prolonging vehicle lifespan, and ensuring safety and reliability. It includes inspection of engine components, fluid levels, braking system, suspension and steering, electrical system, tires and wheels, exhaust system, safety equipment, and more.
Sub-category.symptoms: Regular PMIs do not have specific symptoms since they are proactive inspections aimed at identifying potential issues before they cause noticeable symptoms. However, the absence of recent PMIs or a history of neglected maintenance may increase the likelihood of unexpected breakdowns, reduced vehicle performance, or safety hazards.
Sub-category.nationalAveragePrice: Prices for PMIs can vary depending on the vehicle type, location, and the extent of the inspection. Typically, PMIs may range from $100 to $300 or more, but it's best to consult with a local repair shop for accurate pricing.

Sub-category.title: State service
Sub-category.description: Vehicle inspection to ensure compliance with state-mandated safety and emission standards.
Sub-category.symptoms: Required annually or biennially depending on state regulations.

Sub-category.title: Windshield washer fluid refill
Sub-category.description: Refilling windshield washer fluid reservoir to ensure clear visibility.
Sub-category.symptoms: Low washer fluid warning light, insufficient washer fluid during use.

Sub-category.title: Windshield wiper blade replacement
Sub-category.description: Replacement of old or worn-out windshield wiper blades for optimal visibility during inclement weather.
Sub-category.symptoms: Streaking, skipping, or smearing on windshield during wiper operation.

Sub-category.title: Windshield wiper arm replacement
Sub-category.description: Replacement of damaged or malfunctioning windshield wiper arms to ensure proper wiper blade movement.
Sub-category.symptoms: Wiper blades not making proper contact with windshield, excessive play in wiper arm.

Sub-category.title: Low beam light bulb replacement
Sub-category.description: Replacement of low-beam headlight bulbs for proper illumination during night driving.
Sub-category.symptoms: Failed headlight bulb, dim or insufficient light output from low-beam headlights.

Sub-category.title: High beam light bulb replacement
Sub-category.description: Replacement of high-beam headlight bulbs for optimal visibility during night driving.
Sub-category.symptoms: Failed headlight bulb, dim or insufficient light output from high-beam headlights.

Sub-category.title: Parking light replacement
Sub-category.description: Replacement of parking light bulbs for visibility and safety when parking or driving with parking lights on.
Sub-category.symptoms: Failed parking light bulb, illuminated warning light, or reduced visibility.

Sub-category.title: Blinker Light replacement
Sub-category.description: Replacement of turn signal bulbs for proper indication of intended direction when turning or changing lanes.

Sub-category.title: Tail light bulb replacement
Sub-category.description: Replacement of tail light bulbs for visibility and safety when driving in low-light conditions or braking.

Sub-category.title: Brake light bulb replacement
Sub-category.description: Replacement of brake light bulbs for visibility and safety when braking.
Sub-category.symptoms: Failed brake light bulb, illuminated warning light, or reduced visibility.

Sub-category.title: Backup Light replacement
Sub-category.description: Replacement of backup light bulbs for visibility and safety when reversing.
Sub-category.symptoms: Failed backup light bulb, illuminated warning light, or reduced visibility.

Sub-category.title: Dome light replacement
Sub-category.description: Replacement of dome light bulbs for interior illumination.
Sub-category.symptoms: Failed dome light bulb, dim or no interior lighting.

Sub-category.title: Interior light replacement
Sub-category.description: Replacement of interior light bulbs for various interior lighting needs.
Sub-category.symptoms: Failed interior light bulb, dim or no interior lighting.

Sub-category.title: Door panel light replacement
Sub-category.description: Replacement of door panel light bulbs for visibility and aesthetics.
Sub-category.symptoms: Failed door panel light bulb, dim or no door panel lighting.

Sub-category.title: Foo light replacement
Sub-category.description: Replacement of foo light bulbs for specific vehicle lighting needs.
Sub-category.symptoms: Failed foo light bulb, dim or no foo lighting.

Sub-category.title: License plate light replacement
Sub-category.description: Replacement of license plate light bulbs for visibility and compliance with vehicle lighting regulations.
Sub-category.symptoms: Failed license plate light bulb, dim or no license plate illumination.

Sub-category.title: Trunk light replacement
Sub-category.description: Replacement of trunk light bulbs for visibility and convenience when accessing the trunk.
Sub-category.symptoms: Failed trunk light bulb, dim or no trunk lighting.

Sub-category.title: Alternator replacement
Sub-category.description: Replacement of the alternator to ensure proper charging of the vehicle's battery.
Sub-category.symptoms: Dim or flickering lights, battery warning light illuminated, or vehicle stalling.

Sub-category.title: A/C change
Sub-category.description: Replacement of the air conditioning system to restore proper cooling performance.
Sub-category.symptoms: Weak or warm air from vents, unusual noises from A/C system, or A/C system failure.

Sub-category.title: Coolant changes
Sub-category.description: Replacement of old engine coolant to ensure proper engine cooling and temperature regulation.
Sub-category.symptoms: Overheating, coolant leaks, or manufacturer's recommended maintenance interval.

Sub-category.title: Coolant flush
Sub-category.description: Complete flushing of the cooling system to remove old coolant, debris, and contaminants.

Sub-category.description: Replacement of the thermostat to regulate engine temperature and prevent overheating.

Sub-category.title: Radiator replacement
Sub-category.description: Replacement of the radiator to ensure proper engine cooling.

Sub-category.title: Radiator hose replacement
Sub-category.description: Replacement of worn or damaged radiator hoses to prevent coolant leaks.
Sub-category.symptoms: Visible coolant leaks, soft or swollen hoses, or coolant odor.

Sub-category.title: Heater hose replacement
Sub-category.description: Replacement of worn or damaged heater hoses to ensure proper heating operation.

Sub-category.title: Heater Core replacement
Sub-category.description: Replacement of the heater core to restore proper heating performance.
Sub-category.symptoms: No heat or insufficient heat from vents, sweet odor in cabin, or coolant leaks.

Sub-category.title: Blower motor replacement
Sub-category.description: Replacement of the blower motor to restore proper airflow for heating and cooling.
Sub-category.symptoms: Weak airflow from vents, noisy blower motor, or blower motor failure.

Sub-category.title: Engine coolant temperature sensor replacement
Sub-category.description: Replacement of the coolant temperature sensor to ensure accurate temperature readings for engine management.
Sub-category.symptoms: Inaccurate temperature gauge readings, check engine light related to coolant temperature, or engine performance issues.

Sub-category.title: Coolant reservoir replacement
Sub-category.description: Replacement of the coolant reservoir to prevent coolant leaks and ensure proper coolant level.
Sub-category.symptoms: Visible coolant leaks, low coolant level, or damaged coolant reservoir.

Sub-category.title: Fuel injector cleaning service
Sub-category.description: Cleaning of fuel injectors to remove deposits and improve fuel delivery.
Sub-category.symptoms: Poor fuel economy, rough idling, or engine misfires.

Sub-category.title: Spark plug replacement
Sub-category.description: Replacement of spark plugs to ensure proper ignition and engine performance.
Sub-category.symptoms: Rough idling, difficulty starting engine, or decreased fuel efficiency.

Sub-category.title: Air induction cleaning service
Sub-category.description: Cleaning of air intake system components to remove carbon deposits and improve airflow.
Sub-category.symptoms: Reduced engine performance, rough idling, or engine hesitation.

Sub-category.title: Water Pump replacement
Sub-category.description: Replacement of the water pump to ensure proper engine cooling.
Sub-category.symptoms: Coolant leaks, overheating, or noisy water pump.

Sub-category.title: Engine starter replacement
Sub-category.description: Replacement of the starter motor to ensure reliable engine starting.

Sub-category.description: Replacement of the head gasket to prevent coolant and oil leaks between engine block and cylinder head.

Sub-category.description: Replacement of worn or damaged engine mounts to reduce engine vibration and noise.

Sub-category.description: Replacement of the fuel pump to ensure proper fuel delivery to the engine.
Sub-category.symptoms: Engine sputtering at high speeds, loss of power, or difficulty starting.

Sub-category.title: Fuel filter replacement
Sub-category.description: Replacement of the fuel filter to prevent contaminants from reaching the engine.
Sub-category.symptoms: Engine hesitation, rough idling, or decreased fuel efficiency.

Sub-category.title: Plug wire replacement
Sub-category.description: Replacement of spark plug wires to ensure proper ignition system performance.
Sub-category.symptoms: Misfires, rough idling, or engine hesitation.

Sub-category.title: Catalytic converter replacement
Sub-category.description: Replacement of the catalytic converter to reduce emissions and ensure compliance with environmental regulations.

Sub-category.title: Battery cable replacement
Sub-category.description: Replacement of damaged or corroded battery cables to ensure proper electrical connections.
Sub-category.symptoms: Poor electrical connections, difficulty starting engine, or corroded battery terminals.

Sub-category.title: Rod bearing replacement
Sub-category.description: Replacement of worn or damaged rod bearings to prevent engine failure.
Sub-category.symptoms: Knocking or tapping noises from engine, low oil pressure, or engine failure.

Sub-category.title: Flywheel replacement
Sub-category.description: Replacement of the flywheel to ensure proper engagement of the clutch and smooth engine operation.
Sub-category.symptoms: Grinding or scraping noises when starting engine, clutch slippage, or difficulty shifting gears.

Sub-category.title: Windshield replacement
Sub-category.description: Replacement of the windshield due to damage or cracks that impair visibility and safety.
Sub-category.symptoms: Cracked or shattered windshield, obstructed view, or failing windshield integrity.

Sub-category.title: Windshield washer fluid reservoir replacement
Sub-category.description: Replacement of the windshield washer fluid reservoir due to leaks or damage.
Sub-category.symptoms: Visible leaks under vehicle, low washer fluid warning light, or cracked reservoir.

Sub-category.title: Windshield washer pump replacement
Sub-category.description: Replacement of the windshield washer pump to ensure proper washer fluid distribution.

Sub-category.description: Replacement of the windshield wiper motor to ensure proper wiper blade movement.

Sub-category.description: Replacement of the power steering belt to ensure proper operation of power steering system.

Sub-category.title: A/C belt replacement
Sub-category.description: Replacement of the A/C belt to ensure proper operation of air conditioning system.

Sub-category.title: Brake master cylinder replacement

Sub-category.title: Coil spring replacement

Sub-category.symptoms: Vehicle sagging, bottoming out, or uneven tire wear.

Sub-category.title: Door Lock cylinder replacement
Sub-category.description: Replacement of door lock cylinders to ensure proper operation of door locks.
Sub-category.symptoms: Key difficult to turn in lock, door lock cylinder damaged, or door lock failure.

Sub-category.title: Airbag occupant sensor replacement
Sub-category.description: Replacement of airbag occupant sensors to ensure proper airbag deployment.
Sub-category.symptoms: Airbag warning light illuminated, faulty airbag system, or diagnostic trouble codes (DTCs) related to occupant sensor.

Sub-category.title: Liftgate support strut replacement
Sub-category.description: Replacement of liftgate support struts to ensure proper liftgate operation.
Sub-category.symptoms: Liftgate difficult to open or close, liftgate does not stay open, or visible strut damage.
